message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. A little extra to start since you'll be losing value over time.
Alice, let's be realistic. I need to make up for the inflation. This is a fair offer.
Bob, I understand the inflation hits you, but I need a decent share too. This is a compromise.
Alice, time is running out! This is a slight increase from your offer. Take it before inflation eats more of my share!
Bob, let's stop wasting time. This is a fair 50/50 split. We both lose if this keeps going.
